title: Newly renovated apartments.  Move in ready.  No broker fee!
posting_body: ['NO BROKER FEE APARTMENTS', 'BROOKLYN in most neighborhoods are now renting Cozy Studios renting from $1,000, One Bedroom renting from $1,100, two bedrooms renting from $1650, three bedrooms renting from $2000, and low income renting from $800.', 'These are NO BROKER FEE apartments close to transportations.', 'Most apartments are newly renovated with wood floors, tiled Bathroom with a Tub.', 'Three Walk-in Closets on average, Oversize Bedrooms with Double Windows.', 'Enjoy the Conveniences of a Live-In Super in most buildings.', 'Heat & Hot Water are included in some units.', 'Cat & dog friendly in some buildings.', 'Visit', 'WWW.NYCURBANAPARTMENTS.COM', 'Vouchers, Low credit scores, low income are ok in some units.', 'But that will depend on management and requirements may vary.', 'We help our clients get connected to no-fee owners.', '- Students OK', '- Pet friendly OK', '- No credit/Low credit ok with guarantor OK.', "- Gov't assist supplement", 'Ok', "(If you can't get one, we can refer you to a third party company that can be your guarantor).", 'TO GET STARTED YOU MUST MAKE A VIRTUAL OR IN-PERSON APPOINTMENT.', 'VISIT', 'WWW.NYCURBANAPARTMENTS.COM', 'OR CALL', '347.797.2787.', 'NO TEXT', 'DISCLAIMER: All information furnished herein is from sources deemed reliable.', 'No representation is made by nycurbanapartments .com nor is any to be implied as to the accuracy thereof and all information is submitted subject to errors, omissions, change of price, prior sale or lease, or withdrawal without notice.', 'All dimensions, prices, photos, & descriptions are approximate, samples.', 'We are not agents or a representative for any rentals.', 'For exact dimensions, prices, photos, & descriptions can be obtained directly from owner, property management companies, and or agents.', 'Buyer / Lessee is responsible for his / her own due diligence.', 'Central Brooklyn', 'Crown Heights', 'Weeksville', 'Flatbush',
